# OISST

```{r packages, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(pacea)
library(dplyr)
```

## NOAA's Optimal Interpolation Sea Surface Temperature
OISST - long term gridded climate data record 

- 1/4Â° longitude x latitude

- Obervations from satellites, ships, buoys, Argo floats

- Interpolated to fill gaps

- Clipped to Canada's Pacific EEZ

- 925 gridded cells


2 data products: weekly and monthly mean SST (`oisst_7day` and `oisst_month`)


https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/products/optimum-interpolation-sst

R package `erddap`

## OISST - monthly mean
The data are saved as a `sf` (simple feature) `tibble` object in `pacea`:
```{r oisstdata}
oisst_month
```

## Help file
```{r oissthelp, eval=FALSE}
?oisst_month
```

## Built in plots - default
```{r oisstplot}
plot(oisst_month)
```

## Built in plots - select years and months
```{r oisstplot custom}
plot(oisst_month, months.plot = c("April", "June"), years.plot = c(2021:2023))
```
